channel.title: Custom Items on 317 Bases
channel.description: How do I get the client to stretch out my raw model of the custom object/item i created. Like, I want the platelegs I created, to bend/stretch and move as if they were normal platelegs when the player stands still and walks around. I don't know if it's something in my class8.java file I have to add, but could somebody help me. My goal is to make custom platelegs that actually work.

item.title: Custom Items on 317 Bases
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

thanks ha

item.title: Custom Items on 317 Bases
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:3, topic:520309”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=638807.msg4306084#msg4306084 date=1369842528]
Wrong Section.

OT: I Think You Should Ask Amy Webb For Some Help, She Is An Expert
[/quote]

amy is more of a modeler than animator trust me i work with her alot but i for giving the platelegs animations you need to download “master palette” and open it in metaseq then add in your model and add the right pri’s, vskins, and tskins you can do it using this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

thats the tut heres the picture for platelegs

ManuallyAnimatingLegs.jpg799×307

also when you go to add in the platelegs if you have any problems with the platelegs showing through other models in game, instead of making the priority 1 like it says make it 10. well good luck

btw not bringing amy webb down lol shes probably the best modeler in the rs models section along with poopler

but let me know if you need any help im decent with about everything involving making models, animating them and adding them in game, i can add custom npcs, objects, and items to PI’s.
i wish more people would learn how and use it to put some originality into rsps’s.

also this is the wrong section should be here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Wow hadlich4, im impressed.

Read full topic
